title: Insurance Industry Services - Forms
text_content:
Virginia law requires any person convicted of violation of the provisions in the Code of Virginia § 18.2-51.4, 18.2-266 and 18.2-272 to purchase a liability insurance policy with coverage that is double the minimum limit set forth in the Code of Virginia §
46.2-472
.
Insurers use forms FR-44 and FR-46 to submit financial responsibility information to DMV. Form FR-44 is used to certify that such coverage was purchased and in effect and form FR-46 is submitted to report cancellation of such coverage.
FR-44
FR-46
